divs: Sighting DetailsThis comet-like bright object moved across the western sky near sunset. The extremely bright object was moving very quickly and seemed rather large. It was so bright that it appeared white hot. It had the appearance of having a short comet like tail. It traveled from south to north rather low above the western horizon (which for me was a group of trees that line my neighbors property and our street). I watched it for about 5 mins trying to figure out what it was. It was traveling at a good clip. So I ran in a grabbed my camera. I came back and filmed it for a few minutes. When I look at the film on my computer, it is almost impossible to see the sky was so bright. But I was able to save a couple of stills from the film and adjust them so it is easier to see.
